name: Memrise-uploader
tagline: A sleek Firefox add-on that let you upload hundreds of files to memrise's server in a click!
body:
### What is this?

This is an addon to provide Firefox users a multiple upload choice on the [memrise][memrise]
 site.

### How

1. Create a course with levels
2. Go to the database page
3. Scroll to bottom, there are two buttons: a file input and a reassuring "Upload!" button
4. Choose your files from the file chooser input
5. Click upload
6. A notification will pop when the task is finished
7. Refresh the page

### Support or Contact

There is a help page bundled with the addon, give it a try. You can [mail me](mailto:edoardo.putti@gmail.com) if you have more questions or you want to talk about this.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
